snippet.title: Sonokuni - Official Trailer | Future Games Show 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the Sonokuni trailer for the top-down, hip hop-infused action game inspired by Hotline Miami. Battle your way through a biopunk and Japanese mythology-inspired world, avoid being hit, and use your time-bending skills to take down your opponents.

Sonokuni will be released on PC. It's available to wishlist on Steam now.
